recommended_treatment: External beam radiotherapy with or without vaginal brachytherapy
description: Specimen shows grade 2 endometrioid adenocarcinoma with clear cell changes confined to an endometrial polyp with 1.0 mm superficial myometrial invasion. All sampled lymph nodes are negative, and final pathologic stage is IB, N0, Mx. Lymphovascular space invasion status not specified.
patient_notes: Your pathology shows an early‐stage uterine cancer that was fully removed and has not spread to lymph nodes. Based on the minimal invasion and grade 2 histology, we recommend external beam radiation therapy, with vaginal brachytherapy as an option. Your care team will personalize the treatment plan and discuss any questions you have.

verification.assessment: FIGO staging IB and pT1b N0 Mx are correct; however, adjuvant treatment recommendations should follow NCCN guidelines for intermediate‐risk stage IB grade 2 endometrioid carcinoma (EBRT ± VBT) without systemic therapy.

recommended_treatment.issues: Does not align with NCCN guidelines for stage IB grade 2 endometrioid carcinoma; systemic therapy is not indicated in the absence of high‐risk features.

description.issues: States 'no lymphovascular invasion' although LVSI status was not reported.

patient_notes.issues: Suggests chemotherapy when NCCN indicates radiation alone (EBRT ± VBT) for intermediate‐risk stage IB grade 2 disease.

change_explanations.recommended_treatment: Changed from 'Systemic therapy with or without external beam radiotherapy and with or without vaginal brachytherapy; or external beam radiotherapy with or without vaginal brachytherapy' to 'External beam radiotherapy with or without vaginal brachytherapy'. Reason: Does not align with NCCN guidelines for stage IB grade 2 endometrioid carcinoma; systemic therapy is not indicated in the absence of high‐risk features.
change_explanations.description: Changed from 'Specimen shows grade 2 endometrioid adenocarcinoma with clear cell changes confined to an endometrial polyp with 1.0 mm superficial myometrial invasion and no lymphovascular invasion. All sampled lymph nodes are negative, and final pathologic stage is IB, N0, Mx.' to 'Specimen shows grade 2 endometrioid adenocarcinoma with clear cell changes confined to an endometrial polyp with 1.0 mm superficial myometrial invasion. All sampled lymph nodes are negative, and final pathologic stage is IB, N0, Mx. Lymphovascular space invasion status not specified.'. Reason: States 'no lymphovascular invasion' although LVSI status was not reported.
change_explanations.patient_notes: Changed from 'Your pathology shows an early-stage uterine cancer that was fully removed and has not spread to lymph nodes. Based on the minimal invasion into the uterus, we recommend radiation therapy to reduce the risk of recurrence; chemotherapy may also be considered and vaginal brachytherapy could be part of the plan. Your care team will personalize the treatment approach and discuss any questions you have.' to 'Your pathology shows an early‐stage uterine cancer that was fully removed and has not spread to lymph nodes. Based on the minimal invasion and grade 2 histology, we recommend external beam radiation therapy, with vaginal brachytherapy as an option. Your care team will personalize the treatment plan and discuss any questions you have.'. Reason: Suggests chemotherapy when NCCN indicates radiation alone (EBRT ± VBT) for intermediate‐risk stage IB grade 2 disease.
